message.body: Are we going to Sugarloaf Maine for our annual New Year's eve ski vacation?
I looked at the site last time I texted and it looked pretty much booked up
I'll call. What nights should I book, If possible? I'm thinking Friday night to And including Monday night, leaving Tuesday afternoon.
That sounds good as long as we leave early enough on Tuesday for the 9.5 hour drive home
Any luck on the ski mountain search?
I am already off. Did you find anything available?
